alert.note: Alert for Edmunds; Faulk (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 04 at 12:20AM MDT until July 04 at 1:00AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Edmunds County in north central South Dakota... North central Faulk County in north central South Dakota... * Until 200 AM CDT. * At 120 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Thunderbird Colony, or 15 miles northwest of Faulkton, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Loyalton around 135 AM CDT. Blumengard Colony around 140 AM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
